column4: i am trying to make some cron schedules, i put in 36 9 * * * /usr/bin/firefox to test if firefox will run at 9:36am but it does not, what am i doing wrong

so it cant launch any gui apps? simplexio but can it launch a script that launches a gui app?
you need to pass the "DISPLAY" to it, and it works in cron
